channel.title: CVE Feed for Zscaler -- ZIA Admin Portal
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Zscaler -- ZIA Admin Portal

item.title: CVE-2023-28801|2023-08-31T13:53:27.304Z -- zscaler -- zia%20admin%20portal
item.description: An Improper Verification of Cryptographic Signature in the SAML authentication of the Zscaler Admin UI allows a Privilege Escalation.This issue affects Admin UI: from 6.2 before 6.2r.
